explanation: [0-0] In a room near the wall, a man in brown clothes is squatting barefoot on the ground, holding a wooden stick in his right hand. Opposite him, a young man in a yellow and black top is holding a push-up position with both hands supporting his body on the ground.

[0-2] Then the man in brown clothes waves the stick in his right hand and strikes towards the arms of the young man in the yellow and black top. The young man immediately raises his arms and then lowers them. Immediately afterwards, the man in brown clothes swings the stick again, and the young man in the yellow and black top immediately raises his arms, successfully dodging it again.

The young man immediately raises his arms and then lowers them. Immediately afterwards, the man in brown clothes swings the stick again, and the young man in the yellow and black top immediately raises his arms, successfully dodging it again.

[2-7] The man in brown clothes swings the stick again, but this time the young man in the yellow and black top fails to dodge, and gets hit on his left arm. Then the man in brown clothes looks at the young man opposite him, while the young man in the yellow and black top shakes his head repeatedly.

Then the man in brown clothes looks at the young man opposite him, while the young man in the yellow and black top shakes his head repeatedly.

[7-16] Then the man in brown clothes throws away the stick in his hand and then takes out a large silver knife from his left side with his right hand. Then the man in brown clothes holds the knife with both hands and slashes towards the arms of the young man in the yellow and black top, who is so frightened that he immediately raises his hands. The man in brown clothes then continuously swings the knife, and the speed gets faster and faster, but the young man in the yellow and black top successfully dodges all of them.
